---
category: news
title: "Home Appliance Manufacturers Get Energy- and Cost-Saving AI with Femtosense/ABOV Semiconductor Collaboration"
excerpt: "Until now, home appliance manufacturers were unable to add AI features on-device to many mass market products due to the prohibitive power consumption and cost of other AI-capable chips. Femtosense's first generation AI technology enables voice control and other AI functions in energy and cost-sensitive appliances and devices by leveraging sparse mathematics to strip away the unnecessary work in AI and significantly improve efficiency."
